title: 4 Bdr, 2.5 Bth, Spacious n Sexy Home
description:
This move-in ready home in the Walnut Hill section of the city is highly recommended for viewing. It is an end row home that underwent a full renovation in 2019 and offers numerous upgrades. As you enter the home, you'll immediately notice the open floor plan connecting the living and kitchen areas, enhanced by recessed lighting throughout. The living area boasts new hardwood floors that transition seamlessly into tile as you enter the kitchen. The spacious eat-in kitchen features stainless steel appliances, white shaker cabinets, beautiful granite countertops, and a tile backsplash. Additionally, conveniently located on the first floor, just behind the kitchen, you'll find a modern half bath and a laundry area with a door leading to the cozy and private fenced-in backyard.
The home's modern appeal continues with beautifully open staircases and modern railings. On the second floor, which is carpeted wall to wall, you'll discover four spacious bedrooms and two full baths. The first bathroom includes a tub shower, while the master bath, located in the main hall, features a tiled standing shower.
Descending the staircase, you'll be impressed by the stunning finished basement, complete with a tile floor. The basement's living area is divided into two separate rooms, providing versatility for various purposes. Whether you envision a second living area, a home office, a toy room, a gym area, or even extra storage space, this basement can accommodate your needs. Additionally, in a separate area of the basement, you'll find the utility closet housing newly replaced HVAC units, a water heater, and an electrical panel. Everything, including the HVAC system, plumbing, electrical wiring, and water-related components, was updated in 2019.
Given the appealing features and recent renovations, this house is expected to be in high demand. It is recommended to schedule a showing and see the property for yourself before it’s gone.

title: Northern Liberties 2 Bed House with 2 Car Parking and Huge Yard
description:
Tucked away on a secluded, tree-lined block, this home offers tranquility and privacy all while being centrally located in thriving Northern Liberties! With a walk score of 92 and your own SECURED parking space, what more could you need?
The first floor has a spacious kitchen, ample living/dining space, a half bath, and inviting French doors which lead to a fenced-in back deck and driveway. The privacy fence is electronic and you can fit up to 2 standard sized cars if you need to! There is also a community parking lot with 3 guest parking spaces that can be used on a first come, first serve basis.
Head upstairs to the second floor: the smallest bedroom has been converted to a laundry room with a full sized washer/dryer, built in shelving for storage, and closet. Do you work from home? The 2nd bedroom is generous in size and can fit a queen sized bed, desk, and has a bifold closet with built-ins, allowing plenty of space for clothes!
The primary bedroom is large and can fit a king sized bed, desk/dresser, and it, too, has plenty of closet space. Not to mention, all rooms on the 2nd floor have considerably sized windows - perfect for enjoying a spring breeze and natural sunlight. Last, you'll find a fully tiled bathroom with walk-in shower.
Listing provided by Compass Pennsylvania LLC

title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
